bridge.title: Bridge (Bring Back Octagon!)
bridge.description: Transfer your OCTAA tokens and CrazyOctagon NFTs between Monad Testnet and Solana. Fast, secure, and with minimal fees. Cross-chain for true collectors!

guide.title: ü™Ñ Resurrection Guide
guide.intro: You can bring a cube back from the graveyard by paying 10% CRAA of marketplace price + 30% OCTAA fee.
guide.fee: The fee is calculated automatically from the latest market price and is permanently burned.
guide.requirement: To resurrect, select 2 NFTs that have at least 1 star.
guide.rarity: Star ratings: 1 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Common, 2 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Uncommon, 3 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Rare, 4 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Epic, 5 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Mythic.
guide.penalty: After successful resurrection, each selected NFT loses 1 star.
guide.step1: 1. Approve CRAA and OCTAA spending for the fees.
guide.step2: 2. Confirm the Bridge transaction ‚Äî NFT instantly returns to your wallet.
guide.note: Only 5,000 cubes exist, their number will never change. Burned OCTAA goes to dead-wallet; no one can recover it.

burn.title: Burn NFT (Roast the Octagon!)
burn.description: Burn NFT and get OCTAA tokens! Epic scene of a fiery grill with piercing screaming cubes: "Tell my mom I love her!"

feeBox.title: üî• Burn Fee & Steps
feeBox.step1: 1. Give the contract permission to move your NFT.
feeBox.step2: 2. Allow OCTAA spending for 10% of locked coins.
feeBox.step3: 3. Confirm final transaction ‚Äî cube burns, OCTAA goes to you.
feeBox.note: Make sure you have enough OCTAA in your wallet for the fee before starting.

guide.title: üî• Burn Guide
guide.intro: Ping your NFT within the last 7 days to unlock mined OCTAA ‚Äî burning releases locked OCTAA after the chosen wait period.
guide.loss: Burning permanently moves the NFT to the graveyard. Locked OCTAA becomes withdrawable only via the rewards/claim flow.
guide.step1: 1. Approve the game contract to transfer your NFT.
guide.step2: 2. Approve OCTAA spending for the burn fee (10% of locked OCTAA).
guide.step3: 3. Confirm the burn transaction. After it completes, the cube is burned and OCTAA is released to you after the selected wait.
guide.timing: OCTAA is released after the chosen delay (30m / 120m / 480m). During the wait the cube shows a cooldown state.
guide.note: Example: 10,000 locked OCTAA ‚Üí fee = 1,000 OCTAA (10%). Longer delay changes split, not fee.
guide.pingLock: Pinging only accrues rewards ‚Äî OCTAA remains locked until burn.
guide.bridgeNote: To resurrect an NFT from the graveyard use the 'Breed' section. Note: total cube supply is capped (approx. 9,700) and OCTAA burned during actions goes to a dead wallet and cannot be recovered.
guide.sellOCTA: Sell OCTAA on PancakeSwap - open PancakeSwap
guide.fees: üîπ OCTAA token fees: 3% on transfers (to game contract) ‚Ä¢ 10% on DEX sales (to game contract) ‚Ä¢ 0% on DEX buys. Fees help fund the game economy and reward pools.

guide.title: ü™Ñ Breeding Guide Click here
guide.intro:
This game is fully built on the Monad Testnet blockchain. All game actions are handled by smart contracts; the website is only an information display.
Breed a new cube by paying 40% (10% CRAA + 30% OCTAA) of the minimum (floor) marketplace price. Parents each lose 1 ‚≠ê after breeding and enter a 48-hour cooldown.
guide.fee: The fee is calculated automatically from the floor (minimum) marketplace price of the collection and is paid in CRAA + OCTAA. Distribution: 10% CRAA is permanently burned; from the 30% OCTAA portion, 10% is added to the OCTAA‚ÄìWMON LP on PancakeSwap and linked to the newly created NFT, and 20% is permanently burned.
guide.requirement: Select 1 Male and 1 Female active NFTs (not in graveyard) with at least 1 ‚≠ê for breeding.
guide.rarity: Star ratings: 1 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Common, 2 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Uncommon, 3 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Rare, 4 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Epic, 5 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Legendary, 6 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Mythic.
guide.step1: 1. Allow OCTAA spending for fees (get OCTAA on PancakeSwap ‚Äî Monad Testnet if needed). Token fees: 0% on purchase, 10% on sale, 3% on transfer.
guide.step2: 2. Confirm breeding ‚Äî a new cube is created; 10% CRAA is burned; 10% OCTAA goes to PancakeSwap LP (OCTAA‚ÄìWMON) and binds to the new NFT; 20% OCTAA is burned; both parents enter a 48-hour cooldown.
guide.note: Collection limited to 9,700 cubes; fee uses marketplace floor price. Random chance to obtain a cube of higher rarity than both parents. OCTAA burns to the dead-wallet with no recovery.

wallet.gameGuideContent:
üéÆ CrazyOctagon Game Guide

üîπ Getting Started
‚Ä¢ Get OCTAA tokens ‚Äî for gas fees and game actions
‚Ä¢ Buy CrazyOctagon NFTs on the marketplace
‚Ä¢ Before buying, check the NFT in the "Information" ‚Üí "NFT Inspector" section ‚Äî enter the NFT number and get complete information: amount of locked coins, remaining stars, cooldown status and other parameters

üîπ How to Start Playing
‚Ä¢ Go to the Ping tab ‚Äî you'll see your NFTs
‚Ä¢ For a new octagon, press Activate ‚Äî this is the first Ping, it doesn't give OCTAA but starts the timer
‚Ä¢ After activation, you can ping (click Ping). Default is once every 24 hours, rewards start accumulating
‚Ä¢ You can skip pings for up to 7 days ‚Äî rewards and bonuses will accumulate automatically
‚Ä¢ After 7 days without ping, accumulation stops until you ping again
‚Ä¢ Each successful Ping brings OCTAA ‚Äî amount depends on:
  - Octagon rarity (Common, Rare, Mystic, etc.)
  - Your experience bonus ‚Äî grows every 24 hours
  - Time between pings (if more periods passed, more OCTAA)

üîπ What is Experience Bonus
‚Ä¢ Initially all octagons have -50% penalty
‚Ä¢ Every 24 hours your bonus grows by +2.7%
‚Ä¢ Maximum you can reach +97.2% + rarity bonuses also count
‚Ä¢ You can skip pings for up to 7 days ‚Äî bonus keeps growing automatically
‚Ä¢ No penalties for missing pings within 7 days
‚Ä¢ After 7 days without ping, bonus stops growing until you ping again

üîπ How to Get OCTAA
‚Ä¢ OCTAA doesn't drop to wallet immediately, but accumulates inside the octagon (this way each NFT has real value)
‚Ä¢ To collect ‚Äî you need to burn the octagon (Burn) (your octagon goes to graveyard section and no longer belongs to you, you get OCTAA coins in the claim section)

üîπ How to Burn
‚Ä¢ Go to Burn section
‚Ä¢ Choose octagon and waiting time:
  - 30 minutes ‚Üí 50% to player
  - 120 minutes ‚Üí 70%
  - 480 minutes ‚Üí 80%
‚Ä¢ The rest is split between pool and permanent burning (goes to official dead wallet)
‚Ä¢ After chosen time, go and press Claim ‚Äî OCTAA will come to your wallet

üîπ How to Revive Octagon (Breed)
‚Ä¢ Go to Breed section
‚Ä¢ Choose 2 living octagons (with at least 1 star and not in cooldown)
‚Ä¢ Select gender for each octagon: male or female (both genders required for breeding)
‚Ä¢ Pay fee: 40% (10% CRAA + 30% OCTAA) of minimum marketplace price
‚Ä¢ Random NFT from graveyard will return to you as new, with all stars but no coins:
  - Bonus is reset (back to -50%)
  - Stars are restored
  - 48-hour cooldown period begins
  - Can ping again from scratch after cooldown

üîπ Where OCTAA is in the System
‚Ä¢ OCTAA for Ping comes from monthly reward pool
‚Ä¢ OCTAA spent on Breed returns to this pool
‚Ä¢ OCTAA from Burn burns forever
‚Ä¢ Everything burned goes to special wallet 0x...dead and disappears forever

üîπ OCTAA Token Fees
‚Ä¢ 3% fee on transfers ‚Äî goes to game contract
‚Ä¢ 10% fee on DEX sales ‚Äî goes to game contract
‚Ä¢ 0% fee on DEX purchases ‚Äî no fee when buying
‚Ä¢ All fees support the game ecosystem and reward pool

üîπ Example Strategy
You have three octagons:
‚Ä¢ Common (regular) ‚Äî ping it, bonus grows by 2.7% every 24 hours up to 97%, then stops. Can sell, transfer NFT, bonus is preserved and locked coins in NFT are also preserved
‚Ä¢ Rare ‚Äî use for Breed or accumulate OCTAA
‚Ä¢ Mystic ‚Äî rare, brings more OCTAA, better not to burn

Play calmly:
‚Ä¢ Ping when convenient ‚Äî you can skip up to 7 days without penalties
‚Ä¢ Rewards and bonuses accumulate automatically during this time
‚Ä¢ Periodically burn weak octagons ‚Üí get tokens
‚Ä¢ Or revive dead ones ‚Äî get chance for rarer one

üí° Tips
Want maximum profit ‚Äî ping regularly and don't burn rare octagons too early.
üí• Burned tokens won't return ‚Äî this increases the value of remaining OCTAA.

üöÄ Our Vision
Our plans within 1-2 months are to adjust the gameplay and renounce admin rights on NFT and token contracts. We want to conduct a social experiment and create fully social gameplay where there are no possibilities to change anything ‚Äî only market and people decide.

The team has no bonuses in the contract in the form of OCTAA coins. You can create a wallet, for example, in Rabby wallet in 1 minute and play our game.

Soon our game will be 100% decentralized with market self-regulation..

what.title: üí° What is slippage?
what.description: Slippage is the maximum price change you are willing to accept. In high volatility or low liquidity, the price may change between the moment the transaction is sent and its execution.

guide.title: How to Bridge Assets
guide.intro: Bridge your assets between Monad Testnet and Solana networks safely and efficiently.
guide.step1: Select the type of asset to bridge (OCTAA tokens or NFTs)
guide.step3: Enter amount or select NFT to transfer
guide.step4: Confirm transaction and wait for completion
guide.note: Bridge process typically takes 30-60 seconds. Assets are secured by smart contracts during transfer.
